name: Dishoveled
description:
Ever wonder what lies beneath the dirt? What secrets remain uncovered? Don't lose your cool thinking on it, get that shovel and dig away!

Technology Notes: 

Additional assets were created using Maya 2019 and Adobe Illustrator (Educator's editions)

Installation Instructions: 

1. Download the executable file

2. Unzip the packaged file

3. Located and click Dishoveled.exe

Credits: 

Special Thanks to the following artists/developers for your fantastic resources!

  • Joyce Minions Art for the amazing Triplanar shaders and skybox
  • Tri-Tachyon for the background Music
  • MoreMountain's very own particle fx from the amazing Corgi3D engine
